Uses of Package
com.burstly.lib.component

Packages that use com.burstly.lib.component
com.burstly.lib.component Package contains interfaces and abstractions for different types of ad components. 
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent Package contains 3-rd party libs implementations of IBurstlyAdaptor interface. 
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.admob Package contains AdMob implementation of IAdaptorController interface. 
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly Package contains native burstly ads implementations. 
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.html   
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.video   
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.greystripe Package contains GreyStripe implementation of IBurstlyAdaptor interface. 
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.inmobi Package contains native InMobi ads implementations. 
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.jumptap Package contains native JumpTap ads implementations. 
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.millennial Package contains Millenial implementation of IBurstlyAdaptor interface. 
com.burstly.lib.exception Package contains custom burstly exception handlers. 
com.burstly.lib.feature.networks   
com.burstly.lib.ui Package contains BurstlyView components that houses every Ad type. 
com.burstly.lib.util Provides convinient util methods. 
 

Classes in com.burstly.lib.component used by com.burstly.lib.component
BurstlyAdaptorListenerWrapper
          Simple wrapper class that delegates calls to underlying object.
ComponentQueue.IQueueComponentListener
          This interface is used to notify when active component has been changed.
ComponentQueueElement
          Component queue element.
FailedToShow
          This class represents component that was failed to show.
IAdaptorController
          Interface describes adaptor controller.
IAdaptorController.IComponentQueueLifecycleListener
          This interface describes Control life cycle.
IBurstlyAdaptor
          This interface should be implemented by an ad network adaptor.
IBurstlyAdaptor.AdaptorAction
          Enumeration describes actions that are not suported "out-of-the-box".
IBurstlyAdaptor.BurstlyAdType
          Enumeration describes supported ad types.
IBurstlyAdaptor.TransactionCode
          Enumeration describes supported transaction codes.
IBurstlyAdaptorListener
          This interface should be used by third party SDK in order to integrate into Burstly SDK.
IBurstlyAdaptorListener.FullscreenInfo
          This class is used to provide info about opened/closed fullscreen creative instance.
IInternalBurstlyAdListener
          This interface is used by Burstly sdk internally.
ITrackClickResponseHandler
          This interface should be implemented by an ad network adaptor.
LayoutParametersResolver
          Resolves layout parameters from server response.
